subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT - CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT -
CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm
ET/PT

PARIS SPEAKS!
After Paris
Hilton's first post-jail interview with CNN's Larry
King
tonight, Showbiz Tonight will be the only entertainment
news show on television that will be LIVE with the
very
first reaction and analysis. Will Paris convince
everyone that
she has changed and learned her lesson? Do
not miss this live
Special Report on TV's most provocative
entertainment news
show.

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT
QUESTION OF THE DAY
Paris Hilton out of jail: Do you
think she learned her lesson?
Vote at
http://www.cnn.com/showbiztonight

SEND
US A VIDEO E-MAIL! 
We want to hear your response to
the Question of the Day, or
whatever else is on your mind,
on video. Responses must be no
longer than 30 seconds. To
do it, just head to
http://www.cnn.com/showbiztonight Then tune in
to
see your video e-mail on TV!

WATCH SHOWBIZ
TONIGHT SEVEN NIGHTS A WEEK - 
CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm
ET/PT
